shortdesc.ph: Joins a channel with a User Account and Token.

p.codeblock: public abstract int joinChannelWithUserAccount( String token, String channelName, String userAccount);

- (int)joinChannelByToken:(NSString * _Nullable)token channelId:(NSString * _Nonnull)channelId userAccount:(NSString * _Nonnull)userAccount joinSuccess:(void(^ _Nullable)(NSString * _Nonnull channel, NSUInteger uid, NSInteger elapsed))joinSuccessBlock;
public abstract int JoinChannelWithUserAccount(string token, string channelId, string userAccount);
Future<void> joinChannelWithUserAccount( {required String token, required String channelId, required String userAccount, ChannelMediaOptions? options});

section.p: Once a user joins the channel, the user subscribes to the audio and video streams of all the other users in the channel by default, giving rise to usage and billing calculation. To stop subscribing to a specified stream or all remote streams, call the corresponding mute methods.

pt.props: cpp unreal bp ios mac unity rn electron flutter cs
